description: Welcome to Luxia in Willoughby! 3 storey townhouse featuring 3 Bedrooms + 3 Bathrooms with 1,600 Sq Ft of living space. Modern design with open concept living room & gourmet kitchen featuring an island with quartz countertops,  pantry, and stainless steel kitchen aid appliances. Powder room on the main and laminate flooring throughout. Master Bedroom features a walk-in closet and ensuite bathroom with his & her sinks. Upgrades include gas hookup on the patio, laundry sink & cabinetry and epoxy flooring in the double garage. Total of 3 patios including the amazing ROOF TOP deck ideal for entertaining with stunning views. Located close to shopping, recreation, schools, Hwy 1 and much more. Club House includes a fitness studio and social lounge/party room.  Located in the heart of Langley!
